mapper.select: SELECT distinct goods.good_id, goods.good_name, goods.good_img, goods.look_up, goods.sku_id, goods.good_city_id,goods.show_address,goods.show_time,goods.good_love_num, ticket.ticket_price,check_time.check_time,ticket.ticket_discount FROM goods LEFT JOIN sku on goods.sku_id = sku.sku_id LEFT JOIN check_time on sku.check_time_id = check_time.check_time_id LEFT JOIN ticket on check_time.check_ticket_id = check_ticket_id WHERE goods.good_city_id = #{goodCityId} GROUP BY goods.good_id ORDER BY look_up DESC, ticket_price LIMIT 8
